div.ab:
One who has something in his throat that causes him pain, like a fishbone, or a bone stuck in the throat, or whatever it is that is stuck in the throat: so must he take the same thing(?): if it is a fishbone, he must take a fishbone; if it is a bone, he must take a bone. And he must lay it on his head on the very top(?), where the throat is(???), and he must say the charm three times before him and three times behind him:
"One by one swallow, swallow, go down, one by one. One by one swallow, swallow, go down, one by one. One by one swallow, swallow, go down, one by one."
And three times behind him: "One by one, go down, swallow, swallow, one by one. One by one, go down, swallow, swallow, one by one. One by one, go down, swallow, swallow, one by one."
